sub_title: Co-Founder Hence | Palantir Alum | Angel Investor
summary:
I'm motivated by a desire to help people better understand themselves and others through the use of data and technology with the hope that this will help us to create richer, more meaningful, and more sustainable futures for all of us. 

I thrive in environments where I feel empowered to work on challenges that are outside of my comfort zone and aim to empower those who work with and for me in the same way. I've found I'm most successful in situations where the problems are not fully understood and solutions feel far away.

Having lived, worked, and been successful in many contexts with many different types of people, I seek out diversity of thought and experience because I know it will improve my ability to solve problems and also be rewarding in its own right.

I'm always open to supporting others if I can, be it through guidance, investment, or something else and I'm specifically interested in supporting those who have had less privileged backgrounds than myself.
